title: Antony Blinken Heading to Paris on a Fence-Mending Mission
sub_head: Secretary of State will meet French counterparts as administration works to heal a rift after its Australian submarine deal
body:
Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Paris next week, as the Biden administration continues with its efforts to heal a rift with the nationâ€™s oldest ally.
During a visit from Monday to Wednesday, Mr. Blinken is set to meet French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian, who sharply criticized a new security partnership announced Sept. 15 among the U.S., U.K. and Australia in the Indo-Pacific.
